version_description: Major behind the scenes changes to screenshot importing to improve reliability and maintainability.
Bug fixes.

Fix a game detection issue.
Other minor bug fixes.

Fixed an issue when pressing the "Switch to Game" button when the target is the 4.x version of WWF.
Other bug fixes.
Fixed screenshot detection on iPad for users that removed ads from Wordfeud.
Fixed screenshot importing on some devices running the latest version of WWF.

Fixed screenshot importing for Scrabble 5.20+
Added support for 10.5" iPad Pro
Improved WWF Screenshot importing
Other bug fixes
Added screenshot importing support for Words With Friends 2 & Words With Friends for Facebook Messenger.

iPhone X support
Improved screenshot importing from WWF2

Added clear buttons in classic mode for quickly deleting just "your letters" or "board letters".
Minor bug fixes

In this release, we've added a server OCR feature that will attempt to parse your screenshot if the built-in screenshot OCR fails. We've also updated our terms of service, privacy policy, and consents in accordance with new global standards.

v6.0.1
Fixed issues reported by users.

v6.0.0
In this release, we've added a server OCR feature that will attempt to parse your screenshot if the built-in screenshot OCR fails. We've also updated our terms of service, privacy policy, and cons

v6.0.2
Fixed issues reported by users.

v6.0.0
In this release, we've added a server OCR feature that will attempt to parse your screenshot if the built-in screenshot OCR fails. We've also updated our terms of service, privacy policy, and cons
Added support for the iPhone XS Max.
All new screenshot reading algorithm. Fully supporting style tiles (colored tiles)!
In this release we updated our dictionaries with some of your suggestions and made numerous bug fixes.
Improved Scrabble screenshot scanning.
Support additional Tile Styles!

Word Breaker 7 is full of all the features you've been requesting! Just a few of the changes include:
Themes - choose from 3 different themes!
Welcome Screen - we've made it easier than ever to get started using Word Breaker.
And much more!

Word Breaker 7 is full of all the features you've been requesting! Just a few of the changes include:
Themes - choose from 3 different themes!
Welcome Screen - we've made it easier than ever to get started using Word Breaker.
And much more!
Minor bug fixes.
In this release we've added support for Scrabble Go, updated our WWF word list, and made other minor bug fixes.

v7.1.1 - Crash fix and other minor bug fixes.
v7.1.0 - In this release we've added support for Scrabble Go, updated our WWF word list, and made other minor bug fixes.

v7.1.2 - Screenshot importing improvements for Scrabble go.
v7.1.1 - Crash fix and other minor bug fixes.
v7.1.0 - In this release we've added support for Scrabble Go, updated our WWF word list, and made other minor bug fixes.

Improved WWF iPad support - we now support the new iPad layout!
Scrabble Go Tile Designs - We have rolled out a huge algorithm update that supports most tile designs!
In this release we've made significant enhancements to our screenshot reading technology for all 3 games.
Updated for iOS 14 support, including changes to make permissions easier and screenshot importing fixes.  Also includes a WWF word list update!

Huge improvement in screenshot reading performance.
Updated WWF dictionary.
WWF screenshot reading fixes.
Improved our OCR infrastructure and made numerous bug fixes.
